basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.name: Curtiss Howard
basics.summary: Driven and accomplished software engineer with fifteen years of experience in Java, Java EE technology, and front-end development.  Seeking a challenging and rewarding software engineering role with a backend emphasis.  Recognized as a valuable technical asset with strong problem-solving and communication skills.

keywords: Java EE Technology (JPA, JAX-RS, Bean Validation, et al.)
Identity Management, Integrations and Technologies (Okta, OpenAM)
Automated Testing and Tooling (JUnit, Cucumber et al.)
Legacy Java EE Technologies (JSP, JSF et al.)
